NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
177 
CHAPTER 27: MANAGEMENT OF CANCERS IN PREGNANCY 
Epidemiological background 
Cancer in pregnancy is not common. Melanoma, Cervical, Breast, Ovarian, and Leukemia are the most common 
pathologies (in descending order). They present a diagnostic, ther
